mapper.insert: insert into db_order_history_log (SEQUENCEID, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, CORPID, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CONTENT) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_order_history_log set BEGINTIME = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, CORPID, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CONTENT from db_order_history_log where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, CORPID, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CONTENT from db_order_history_log
